physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 11 x 14 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on cardboard accompanying photograph: ''Bernie [illegible], Rosen, Phil and [illegible], Jerusalem Veteran Post #342, c. 1945.'' Handwritten on front of photograph: ''Fox Nicholson Studio, by Van Der Veer '46.''

mods.abstract: A group of people pose together in a hotel hallway. They all wear ribbons that say committee and sit in front of a sign that says ''Welcome National Federation of Telephone Workers.''
